content: beanie style and 8 5 for folded brim style choice 4 finishing by grafting with kitchener stitch with ws facing fold hat in half starting at beginning of round and remove marker cut tail of yarn to a length about 4 times the distance of the stitches to be bound off the width of the hat folded holding the two needle points of the circular needle parallel bind off by grafting the stitches on both parallel needles together by using the kitchener stitch weave in yarn ends and trim choice 5 finishing by three needle bind off turn hat inside out and with rs facing fold hat in half starting at beginning of round and remove beginning of round marker bind off all stitches using three needle bind off as follows holding the two needle points of the circular needle parallel take a third working needle of the same size and insert it into the first stitch on each of the two parallel needles points and knit these two stitches together *knit the next stitch on each of the parallel needles together in the same way pass the first stitch on the working needle over the second stitch and off the needle as normally for binding off repeat from * until only one stitch remains on the working needle break yarn and pull the tail through the last stitch to fasten_off weave in yarn ends and trim brat hat rev 08-01-2024 page 3
